name: The Departure Game App
blurb: Let's bring these little guys to life! - http://bit.ly/The-Departure The higher the pledge amount the more we'll pack into the game.
ksr_blurb: <p>Jesse Kuhn's whimsically illustrated app, The Departure Game, sends its chubby protagonist into the sky, hopping from balloon to balloon, as he leaps to his new home in outer space. Just look out for the bad guys!</p>

rewards.reward: ALL SUPPORTERS WILL GET A SPECIAL THANKS IN THE CREDITS OF THE GAME - names will be ordered by donation amount (high to low)
Get a free advance copy of the game when it's released + special thanks in the credits of the game

Get a 5" x 7" hand-signed archival print of "The Departure" which is the inspiration for the game. + special thanks in the credits + get a free advance copy of the game when it's released. \r\n\r\n(SHIPPING included to the U.S., international please add $5 (N. America) and $10 (everywhere else))

Get a limited edition 8" x 10" hand-signed archival print of "The Departure" which is the inspiration for the game + a special thanks in the credits + get a free advance copy of the game when it's released + be a beta tester to help fine tune the game before the launch. (SHIPPING included to the U.S., international please add $5 (N. America) and $10 (everywhere else))

Get a super limited edition 16" x 20" hand-signed archival print of "The Departure" which is the inspiration for the game + a special thanks in the credits + get a free advance copy of the game when it's released + be a beta tester to help fine tune the game before the launch. (SHIPPING included to the U.S., international please add $5 (N. America) and $10 (everywhere else))

Get all the physical goods - everything mentioned above (5x7, 8x10, 16x20 prints) + greeting cards, magnets, bookmarks, PLUS you will be featured as a SPONSOR in the credits + get a free advance copy of the game when it's released + be a beta tester to help fine tune the game before the launch. (SHIPPING included to the U.S., international please add $5 (N. America) and $10 (everywhere else))

Help name the game and make suggestions for power-ups, enemies, worlds etc. You will appear at the top of the credits listed as a CONSULTANT DESIGNER. (note: final decisions on what to include will be left up to my discretion) + get a free advance copy of the game when it's released + be a beta tester to help fine tune the game before the launch
All of the above (Physical goods, Consultant Designer) and a GOLD SPONSOR listing in credits.
All of the above (Physical goods, Consultant Designer), a PLATINUM SPONSOR listing in credits, PLUS a cartoon illustration of you incorporated into the game.
The mother load. All of the above, a Platinum Sponsor listing in credits, PLUS a custom portrait (of a person, animal, or bizarre creature of your choice) by the artist!

All the physical goods, Platinum Sponsor listing in credits, and lunch with me (or phone call) to discuss everything I know about running a successful Kickstarter campaign and how to successfully market mobile apps (I actually do know a lot about this). I'll also share my download #'s and statistics once the app is live in the store.

Aerial Airplane Advertising! Place your company name or company message on a banner for one year flying behind your very own airplane in the background of the skies during game play. (Must be family friendly related)
Get the blimp! 1 full year of advertising in the game. We will add your logo to your very own blimp that will circle the skies in the game. (Must be family friendly related)

Sponsor the game with your company name or logo for one year. We will place your name or logo on the main menu screen with "Sponsored by:" text above it. We can also link that logo/name to your company website as well. (must be family friendly related company/service)
